name: Music 911
tag_list: music-licensing, advertising-music, music-branding, indie-music, tv-music, internet-music, music-copyright, film-music, music, coopyright, license
overview:
Streamlines the Creative and Business Processes of Finding and Licensing Music

Music 911 is a B2B service for the entertainment industry to find quality licensable music for audio-visual productions, including motion pictures, television programming, commercials, video games, advertising and internet productions. Editors, directors, producers, assistants, supervisors, creative directors and anyone involved in the music arena can find licensable music at pre-determined costs, immediately and effortlessly.

Entertainment industry professionals post music requests on Music911.com where music companies and representatives respond by posting MP3s that can then be reviewed by the music seeker and ultimately licensed.

Music 911 replaces the current, age old methodology of finding appropriate music for creative productions which is extremely time consuming and typically a frustrating experience. The service is efficient, immediate and is quality controlled for finding quality licensable music at pre-determined fees.
